mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrIdCntcHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , ID_CNTC_TP_CD , HIST_DT , LOGIN_ID , TOKN_ID , DELETE_YN , PW_RECONFIG_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_ID_CNTC_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_CNTC_TP_CD = #{idCntcTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HIST_DT = #{histDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
